title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description: Description: The label font size doesn't change immediately when it is modified.
OB: The label height remains the same after modifying the font size.
EB: The label height should adjust automatically to accommodate the new font size.
SR: To reproduce the issue:1. Add a label to the application.2. Edit the font size of the label to '18 points'.
